DtScriptedTaskMetaData.myToolTip: Launches missile that flies out and drops torpedo
DtScriptedTaskMetaData.myDescription: Launches a missile that flies out to the vicinity of the target submarine and then drops a homing torpedo. The type of missile and torpedo are determined by the system that provides this task. After the launch, this task is also executed on the missile.

myVariables.item: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="yes" ?> <!DOCTYPE boost_serialization> <boost_serialization signature="serialization::archive" version="8"> <DtScriptedTaskVariable class_id="0" tracking_level="0" version="3"> <myVariableName>targetEntity</myVariableName> <myType>simulationobject</myType> <myLabel>Target Entity:</myLabel> <myToolTip>The target vessel. </myToolTip> <myDefaultValue>All Entities</myDefaultValue> <myRangeBottom>-100000</myRangeBottom> <myRangeTop>100000</myRangeTop> <myVariableData>DtAllEntitiesFilter</myVariableData> <myVisible>1</myVisible> <myIndent>0</myIndent> <myInternal>0</myInternal> </DtScriptedTaskVariable>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="yes" ?> <!DOCTYPE boost_serialization> <boost_serialization signature="serialization::archive" version="8"> <DtScriptedTaskVariable class_id="0" tracking_level="0" version="3"> <myVariableName>dropLocation</myVariableName> <myType>locationwithoutaltitude</myType> <myLabel>Drop Location</myLabel> <myToolTip>Location where the missile converts to a torpedo and drops to the water.</myToolTip> <myDefaultValue></myDefaultValue> <myRangeBottom>-100000</myRangeBottom> <myRangeTop>100000</myRangeTop> <myVariableData></myVariableData> <myVisible>1</myVisible> <myIndent>0</myIndent> <myInternal>0</myInternal> </DtScriptedTaskVariable>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="yes" ?> <!DOCTYPE boost_serialization> <boost_serialization signature="serialization::archive" version="8"> <DtScriptedTaskVariable class_id="0" tracking_level="0" version="3"> <myVariableName>parentLauncher</myVariableName> <myType>simulationobject</myType> <myLabel>Parent Platform</myLabel> <myToolTip>Parent platform that launched the torpedo. Must be the character '-' when this task is run on the launching platform.</myToolTip> <myDefaultValue>-</myDefaultValue> <myRangeBottom>-100000</myRangeBottom> <myRangeTop>100000</myRangeTop> <myVariableData></myVariableData> <myVisible>0</myVisible> <myIndent>0</myIndent> <myInternal>0</myInternal> </DtScriptedTaskVariable>
